document.full_text: ryan vogelsong got an unlikely win in his pitcher's duel with jorge de la rosa as the san francisco giants beat the colorado rockies 3-0 on sunday to close in on first place in the national league west standings.
document.title: giants beat rockies to close gap in nl west
lines_and_colors: ryan vogelsong got an unlikely win in his pitcher's duel with jorge de la rosa as the san francisco giants beat the colorado rockies 3-0 on sunday to close in on first place in the national league west standings.
